lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Analysts said the acquisition could cost Emery earnings in the short term, but long term, after eliminating redundancies and selling other Purolator assets, it should boost Emery's profitability.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This will make Emery a bigger factor in the light weight (delivery) business, but it will not make them a power house," said Douglas Arthur of Kidder, Peabody and Co.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: E.F.Hutton LBO also declined comment on the Emery offer, but said it extended the expiration and withdrawal period on its offer to April six at midnight from today at midnight EST.
